uk.nhs.interoperability.infrastructure

Class ITKMessagingException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • uk.nhs.interoperability.infrastructure.ITKMessagingException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ITKCommsException, ITKTransportTimeoutException

    public class ITKMessagingException
extends Exception
    Base exception for the ITK Messaging api. Has the capability to wrap standard java exceptions as well as being able to represent more structured errors such as SOAP Faults - e.g. by representing the <itk:ToolkitErrorInfo/> information elements
    Since:
    version 0.1
    Author:
    Michael Odling-Smee, Nicholas Jones
    See Also:
    ITKTransportTimeoutException, ITKCommsException, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ITKMessagingException(int errorCode, String message)
      Creates an ITKMessagingException with any relevant diagnostic information about the error - such as the likely cause.
      ITKMessagingException(int errorCode, String message, Throwable cause)
      Creates an ITKMessagingException that wraps an underlying Throwable which has been encountered when sending/receiving a message

      Note: by default the errorCode is assumed to be a code associated with the DEFAULT_ERROR_CODESYSTEM_OID codeSystem

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_ERROR_CODESYSTEM_OID

        public static final String DEFAULT_ERROR_CODESYSTEM_OID
        This is the OID to represent the default code system when raising SOAP faults etc. OID is 2.16.840.1.1138883.2.1.3.2.4.17.268

      • ITKMessagingException

        public ITKMessagingException(String message)

      • ITKMessagingException

        public ITKMessagingException(Throwable cause)
        Creates an ITKMessagingException that wraps an underlying Throwable which has been encountered when sending/receiving a message
        Parameters:
        cause - The Throwable containing the root cause

      • ITKMessagingException

        public ITKMessagingException(int errorCode,
                     String message)
        Creates an ITKMessagingException with any relevant diagnostic information about the error - such as the likely cause. An error code associated with the exception indicates the characteristics of the underlying issue - e.g. whether or not it is retryable or not getErrorCode().

        Note: by default the errorCode is assumed to be a code associated with the DEFAULT_ERROR_CODESYSTEM_OID codeSystem
        Parameters:
        errorCode - The appropriate errorCode associated with the exception - INVALID_MESSAGE_CODE; PROCESSING_ERROR_RETRYABLE_CODE; PROCESSING_ERROR_NOT_RETRYABLE_CODE and ACCESS_DENIED_CODE
        message - The diagnostic message about the the error condition

      • ITKMessagingException

        public ITKMessagingException(String message,
                     Throwable cause)
        Creates an ITKMessagingException that wraps an underlying Throwable which has been encountered when sending/receiving a message
        Parameters:
        message - The diagnostic message about the the error condition
        cause - The Throwable containing the root cause

      • ITKMessagingException

        public ITKMessagingException(int errorCode,
                     String message,
                     Throwable cause)
        Creates an ITKMessagingException that wraps an underlying Throwable which has been encountered when sending/receiving a message

        Note: by default the errorCode is assumed to be a code associated with the DEFAULT_ERROR_CODESYSTEM_OID codeSystem
        Parameters:
        errorCode - The appropriate errorCode associated with the exception - INVALID_MESSAGE_CODE; PROCESSING_ERROR_RETRYABLE_CODE; PROCESSING_ERROR_NOT_RETRYABLE_CODE and ACCESS_DENIED_CODE
        message - The diagnostic message about the the error condition
        cause - The Throwable containing the root cause

    • Method Detail

      • getErrorCode

        public int getErrorCode()
        Obtains the errorCode associated with the ITKMessagingException. Note: by default the errorCode is assumed to be a code associated with the DEFAULT_ERROR_CODESYSTEM_OID codeSystem
        Returns:
        the errorCode associated with the exception and appropriate to the getErrorCodeSystem()}. If no error code has been defined NO_ERROR_CODE (the int -1) is returned

      • setErrorCode

        public void setErrorCode(int errorCode)
        Sets the errorCode associated with the ITKMessagingException. Note: by default the errorCode is assumed to be a code associated with the DEFAULT_ERROR_CODESYSTEM_OID codeSystem. To use and alternative system set the errorCodeSystem via the setErrorCodeSystem(String) method
        Parameters:
        errorCode - The appropriate errorCode associated with the exception - INVALID_MESSAGE_CODE; PROCESSING_ERROR_RETRYABLE_CODE; PROCESSING_ERROR_NOT_RETRYABLE_CODE and ACCESS_DENIED_CODE

      • getErrorCodeSystem

        public String getErrorCodeSystem()
        Obtains the errorCodeSystem for any errorCode associated with the ITKMessagingException. This is only relevant if the getErrorCode() returns anything other than NO_ERROR_CODE
        Returns:
        The errorCodeSystem associated with the errorCode for with the ITKMessagingException. The default error code system is indicated by the DEFAULT_ERROR_CODESYSTEM_OID

      • setErrorCodeSystem

        public void setErrorCodeSystem(String errorCodeSystem)
        Sets the errorCodeSystem for any errorCode associated with the ITKMessagingException. This is only relevant if the setErrorCode(int) (or an appropriate constructor) is used to set the errorCode to something other than NO_ERROR_CODE
        Parameters:
        errorCodeSystem - The errorCodeSystem associated with the errorCode for with the ITKMessagingException. The default error code system is indicated by the DEFAULT_ERROR_CODESYSTEM_OID

      • getRelatedMessageProperties

        public ITKMessageProperties getRelatedMessageProperties()

      • setRelatedMessageProperties

        public void setRelatedMessageProperties(ITKMessageProperties relatedMessageProperties)

      • getErrorId

        public String getErrorId()
        Obtains the unique errorId for the ITKMessagingException The errorId is typically expected to be used in applications logs to uniquely tie log messages / exception traces together to aid in diagnostics
        Returns:
        the errorId associated with this ITKMessagingException.

      • setErrorId

        public void setErrorId(String errorId)
        Obtains the unique errorId for the ITKMessagingException The errorId is typically expected to be used in applications logs to uniquely tie log messages / exception traces together to aid in diagnostics
        Parameters:
        errorId - the errorId associated with this ITKMessagingException.

      • getMessage

        public String getMessage()
        Obtains the standard (human readable message) associated with the ITKMessagingException. The text also contains the errorId to ensure it is represented in logs/stack traces
        Overrides:
        getMessage in class Throwable

      • getLocalizedMessage

        public String getLocalizedMessage()
        Obtains the standard (human readable message) associated with the ITKMessagingException in the language for the Locale where it localised messages are available. The text also contains the errorId to ensure it is represented in logs/stack traces
        Overrides:
        getLocalizedMessage in class Throwable

      • decodeErrorCode

        public String decodeErrorCode()
        Convenience method to decode any errorCode from the DEFAULT_ERROR_CODESYSTEM_OID.
        Returns:
        The appropriate error text. If the codeSystem is not the DEFAULT_ERROR_CODESYSTEM_OID returns the getMessage() text.

      • getRelatedItkTransportProperties

        public ITKTransportProperties getRelatedItkTransportProperties()

      • setRelatedItkTransportProperties

        public void setRelatedItkTransportProperties(ITKTransportProperties relatedItkTransportProperties)
